## Exercise 1 (p. 10)

```{python}
import numpy as np

N=1000
u=np.random.rand(N)
x=-np.log(1-u)/3
print(x[:5])
```

## Uniform random numbers (p. 15)

```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x=np.random.rand(1000)*2-1
plt.hist(x)
plt.xlabel("x")
plt.ylabel("Frequency")
plt.title("Histogram of X")
plt.show()
```

## Normal random numbers (p. 16)
```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x=np.random.normal(3,2,size=1000)
plt.hist(x)
plt.xlabel("x")
plt.ylabel("Frequency")
plt.title("Histogram of X")
plt.show()
```

## Exponential random numbers (p. 17)
```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x=np.random.exponential(1/5,size=10000)
plt.hist(x)
plt.xlabel("x")
plt.ylabel("Frequency")
plt.title("Histogram of X")
plt.show()
```

## Poisoon random numbers (p. 18)
```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x=np.random.poisson(5, size=10000)
plt.hist(x)
plt.xlabel("x")
plt.ylabel("Frequency")
plt.title("Histogram of X")
plt.show()
```
